Column Description: Assessment set identifier - What group of assessments this belongs with
Diagnosis Set identifier - Groups diagnosis episodes together

Diagnosis type - Final diagnosis (done at the end of each episode), clinical diagnosis (done by nurses/doctors), Presenting complaint (Main complaint in A&E) , Admitting diagnosis (done by nurses/doctors)
the system that this is recorded from
Set of observations identifier - What observations are done together
Index of multiple deprivation income decile
Index of multiple deprivation employment decile
Index of multiple deprivation health and disability decile
Index of multiple deprivation education skills and training decile
Index of multiple deprivation barriers to housing and services decile
Index of multiple deprivation crime decile
Index of multiple deprivation living environment decile
died within 7 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
died within 14 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
died within 30 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
died within 90 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
died within 180 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
died within 365 days of discharge flag - 1 or 0
Flag whether postcode was valid to be mapped to a closest weather station. 1= valid , 0 = invalid
